mapper.select: SELECT id, law_id, law_mst, law_name, law_type, version, content, proclaimed_date, enforced_date, revision_type, fetched_at FROM law_snapshots WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, law_id, law_mst, law_name, law_type, version, content, proclaimed_date, enforced_date, revision_type, fetched_at FROM law_snapshots ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO law_snapshots ( law_id, law_mst, law_name, law_type, version, content, proclaimed_date, enforced_date, revision_type, fetched_at ) VALUES ( #{lawId}, #{lawMst}, #{lawName}, #{lawType}, #{version}, #{content}, #{proclaimedDate}, #{enforcedDate}, #{revisionType}, #{fetchedAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE law_snapshots SET law_id = #{lawId}, law_mst = #{lawMst}, law_name = #{lawName}, law_type = #{lawType}, version = #{version}, content = #{content}, proclaimed_date = #{proclaimedDate}, enforced_date = #{enforcedDate}, revision_type = #{revisionType}, fetched_at = #{fetchedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
